DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy DSG 1 % compare placebo apply four time day subject acute blunt soft tissue injuries/contusions limbs
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Diclofenac Sodium Topical Gel 1 % Applied Four Times Daily Subjects With Acute Blunt Trauma Injuries
DOC.criteria: Male female age 18 year . Fresh impact injury ( blunt , traumatic soft tissue injury contusion ) upper low limb , require admittance hospital , meet baseline pain intensity level.Anticipated time injury treatment must less 3 hour . Pain medication take within 6 hour precede randomization.Any physical impairment would influence study 's efficacy evaluation , particular POM : peripheral central neurological disease , significant back pain ; case acute blunt soft tissue injury low limb : symptomatic osteoarthritis hip , knee , foot , painful condition low extremity ( e.g. , painful nail , wound , corn , wart ) , case acute blunt soft tissue injury upper limb : painful condition upper extremity .
